movies.title: Jackson Pollock 51
movies.plot: Artist Jackson Pollock is seen at work painting a large canvas, then later on painting on a large sheet of glass.
movies.simplePlot: Artist Jackson Pollock is seen at work painting a large canvas, then later on painting on a large sheet of glass.

biography.bio: Jackson Pollock was born on January 28, 1912 in Cody, Wyoming, USA as Paul Jackson Pollock. He is known for his work on Jackson Pollock: Love and Death on Long Island (1999), Jackson Pollock 51 (1951) and Works of Calder (1950). He was married to Lee Krasner. He died on August 11, 1956 in Long Island, New York, USA.
biography.name: Jackson Pollock
